page.title: omniORB bugs
page.head: omniORB bugs
page.p: We try very hard to make omniORB releases free of bugs, but inevitably some are discovered. The pages linked below list the bugs fixed in the specified omniORB versions. If a bug in the most recent release is affecting you, you should get the current development version from CVS. Make sure you use the correct branch tag (omni3_develop for omniORB 3.0.x).

If you think you have found a bug in omniORB, please subscribe to the mailing list and post your bug report there. If you have an urgent problem, and you want to pay to have it fixed, contact info@omniorb-support.com.

Bugs fixed in:
omniORB 3.0.x:
omniORB 3.0.5
omniORB 3.0.4
omniORB 3.0.3

omniORB 3.0.0
